actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_BANK_DETAILS SET
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_NAME = '{{vayStlBankName.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BRANCH_NAME = '{{vayStlBankBranchName.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = '{{vayStlBankAccountNo.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM = '{{vayStlBankReAccountNo.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_TYPE = '{{vayStlBankClearingCode.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE = '{{vayStlBankAccountType.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_IBAN = '{{vayStlBankIban.text}}',	
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SWIFTCODE = '{{vayStlBankSwift.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_NAME = '{{vayStlOfficialName.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_MOBILE = '{{vayStlOfficialMobile.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_PHONE = '{{vayStlOfficialPhone.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_EMAIL = '{{vayStlOfficialEmail.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SELFUNDERTAKE = '{{vayStlSelfUndertake.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE1 = '{{vayStlBankAddr1.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE2 = '{{vayStlBankAddr2.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_CITY = '{{vayStlBankCity.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_DISTRICT = '{{vayStlBankDistrict.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_ZIP = '{{vayStlBankPostalCode.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_STATE = '{{vayStlBankState.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_COUNTRY = '{{vayStlBankCountry.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_NAME = '{{vayCrspBankName.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = '{{vayCrspBankAccountNo.text}}',	
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM = '{{vayCrspBankReAccountNo.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_TYPE = '{{vayCrspBankClearingCode.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_IBAN = '{{vayCrspBankIban.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_SWIFTCODE = '{{vayCrspBankSwiftCodeCopy.text}}'
  WHERE CUSTOMER_OID ='{{appsmith.store.customerOID}}' AND CUSTOMER_BANK_CURRENCY_CODE = '{{appsmith.store.vayCurrentCcySymbol}}';
